products.title: Spectrum, Energy Yellow - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Spectrum, energy yellow - venetian blind when it comes to the spectrum's energy yellow, the name really does say it all. A bright, bold, and lively shade of yellow that simply refuses to be missed, this gloss finish, aluminium slatted blind is sure to mak
products.productdescription: When it comes to the spectrum's energy yellow, the name really does say it all. A bright, bold, and lively shade of yellow that simply refuses to be missed, this gloss finish, aluminium slatted blind is sure to make a statement wherever it's used. Add fun and cheer to a child's bedroom, where the energy yellow will work hard to pull out complementary colours from playful patterned wallpapers and primary coloured furniture. Or let the sunshine into the bathroom, surrounded by white walls, onto which it will reflect to create a summery glow.
